headline: Crypto stocks get lift, Canada Goose surges, Google I/O
summary: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including the reaction from crypto-related stocks after bitcoin (BTC-USD) climbed to an all-time high just below $110,000, Canada Goose (GOOS) shares soaring on the luxury brand's latest earnings beat, and Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL) stock getting a boost from the latest news and AI announcements coming out of the company's Google I/O Conference. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Coinbase (COIN) Stock Holds Steady Amid Regulatory Scrutiny
summary: Coinbase Global, Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is yet again in the spotlight amid heightened regulatory scrutiny. On May 19, the US Department of Justice lodged an investigation into a significant security breach that resulted in the loss of customer accounts and internal accounts. The crypto exchange could have lost customer names, addresses, and emails following the breach. […]

headline: Home Depot backs outlook as U.S. sales ticked up: Morning Buzz
summary: Stocks are lower at midday, putting in jeopardy the six-day winning streak for the S&P 500. Federal Reserve officials’ commentary is anticipated to provide insights into the central bank’s outlook on inflation and interest rates, while markets continue digesting the implications of Moody’s recent downgrade of the U.S. sovereign credit rating, which has heightened concerns about the nation’s fiscal health as lawmakers debate President Trump’s “big, beautiful” tax bill. headline: Bitcoin rises to new record high, eclipses January top
summary: The world's largest cryptocurrency touched a high of $109,481.83, a 2% gain on the day.  Bitcoin, at times, trades in a similar fashion to tech stocks and other assets that rise in value when investor sentiment is high.  This week they have referenced JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon, a long term crypto sceptic, saying its clients can buy bitcoin and crypto exchange  Coinbase being added to the S&P 500 this month as being contributing factors.

headline: Coinbase says its data breach affects at least 69,000 customers
summary: Coinbase said at least 69,461 customers had personal and financial information stolen during a months-long data breach that it disclosed last week. The crypto giant confirmed the number of affected customers in a filing with Maine's attorney general on Wednesday, as required by the state's data breach notification law. Coinbase's filing said the breach dates back to December 26, 2024, and continued until earlier this month, when the company said it received a "credible" ransom note from the hack

raw.headline: Coinbase says its data breach affects at least 69,000 customers
raw.summary: Coinbase said at least 69,461 customers had personal and financial information stolen during a months-long data breach that it disclosed last week. The crypto giant confirmed the number of affected customers in a filing with Maine's attorney general on Wednesday, as required by the state's data breach notification law. Coinbase's filing said the breach dates back to December 26, 2024, and continued until earlier this month, when the company said it received a "credible" ransom note from the hack

headline: American Crypto Innovation: 3 Made in America Crypto Stocks That Are Worthy of a Place in Your Portfolio
summary: Coinbase is the world's second-largest crypto exchange and a pioneer in creating digital assets for investors to trade.  Strategy is the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin in the world, and the creator of the innovative Bitcoin treasury company strategy.  MARA Holdings is the largest publicly traded Bitcoin mining company and the second-largest corporate holder of Bitcoin.
